attributes.action: Vaccinate front line police officers alongside priority groups 1 and 2.
attributes.background: Police officers are unable to socially distance and do their job effectively.  The police are constantly facing members of the public, dealing with crimes and emergencies in situations where they are at risk of contracting the virus.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564155
